Name: A Dark Ice Saga: The Rescue
About the game: As you run down the slopes of Black Ice Mountain, your robot-friend Citrus was destroyed by Antag! Playing as the hero Dark Ice, your mission is to: Retrieve Citrus's robot pieces, vanquish Antag, and restore you FRIENDSHIP! Keyboard Arrows- Movement A- Jump Enter- Enter Esc- Menu (Save) F1- Options (When game is windowed, not full screen) Game recommended to be played using a gamepad with a PC Controller Keyboard Emulator A Dark Ice Saga: The Rescue A Special Thanks To: RPG Maker VX Ace: Enterbrain Khas Arc Engine Script Script Edits by Kayzee Music: Scott Buckley- www.scottbuckley.com.au Kickstarter Contributors: Wyatt TF Wong Sorrow the Necromancer Jamie 'Reech' Walker Dennis Spreen Bridget, Lizzie & Lucy EarthBoundX5 Mb Leshia Doucet Shelly Shekelsocks Rafael Marinho Florian Bull Axbakk Games AlexRush12 Joey M Enrique Diaz Edoardo Galvagno DillonChester DragonClaw Studios, LLC and ALL of our Supporters! Created By: 13 and 7 year-old Kids and their Parents THANKS FOR PLAYING
